description: I. The State of Security in the civil nuclear industry and the effectiveness of security regulation April 2008 to March 2009: a Report to the Minister of State for Energy, Department of Energy and Climate Change by The Director of Civil Nuclear Security. Incl. annexes. 28 p. II. Letter dated 05/10/2009 from Lord Hunt of Kings Heath to Dr Alan Whitehead MP regarding a report by the Director of Civil Nuclear Security, entitled: The State of Security in the Civil Nuclear Industry and the Effectiveness of Security Regulation April 2008 to March 2009 will be published on 8 October. 1 p.
department: Dept of Energy and Climate Change
